title: Serra do Rio do Rastro
text:
Serra do Rio do Rastro (, literally "Mountain Range of the River of the Track") is a <a href="mountain%20range">mountain range</a> located in the southeast of the state of <a href="Santa%20Catarina%20%28state%29">Santa Catarina</a>, <a href="Southern%20Region%2C%20Brazil">Southern</a> <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>. It is crossed by the road SC-390, with remarkable landscapes and deep cliffs.
This mountain range is situated between the municipalities of <a href="Lauro%20M%C3%BCller%2C%20Santa%20Catarina">Lauro Müller</a> and <a href="Bom%20Jardim%20da%20Serra">Bom Jardim da Serra</a>, and its highest point is situated at 1,460 metres (4,790 feet) above sea level. In the highest areas of this place, the <a href="Atlantic%20Ocean">Atlantic Ocean</a>, located about 100 km (62 mi) away, can be spotted on clear days. <a href="Frost">Frost</a>s are common and <a href="snow">snow</a>falls can occur in the highest areas.
